General.Name: NexgenRX Inc.
General.Description: NexgenRx Inc. administers, adjudicates, and pays drug, dental, and other extended health-care claims for the beneficiaries of health benefit plans underwritten by its customers in Canada. It offers NexSys claims management; NexAdmin plan administration; and NexPSPAssist patient support programs. NexgenRx Inc. was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 185 The West Mall, Toronto, ON, Canada, M9C 5L5
